title: Thunderbird Emails won't delete
content: For some years now I have been unable to delete some messages which, when deleted, keep reappearing multiple times in the Trash folder and in the original folders. This is extremely frustrating of course. Hoping you might be able to help. Regards Adrian
creator: acp100

title: Thunderbird Gmail account isnt working anymore
content:
Hello!

I have changed my password of my Google account.

Now I cant create an account at Tunderbird anymore. It has worked before I have changed the password in my Google account!

What is the problem?

Thank you!

Best regards Uwe
creator: uwekurzynski

title: "text/plain et al" in place of address in email list
content: I've received a couple of emails where in the email list they have text/plain et al where the sender's email address would normally be, and in the email window it says text/plain, charset=UTF-8. Can Thunderbird not handle UTF-8 in emails, or is it just in that part of the email?
creator: n.iredale

title: Problemi di configurazione indirizzo mail tiscali su Thunderbird
content: Buongiorno! Da diversi giorni non riesco a utilizzare la mia mail di Tiscali su Thunderbird. La configurazione mi sembra sia corretta. La cosa strana è che da cellulare e tablet funziona come sempre, solo al pc non funziona. Ha sempre funzionato correttamente e mi spiacerebbe dover cambiare programma. Il messaggio di errore quando provo a configurare il mio indirizzo mail è: "Impossibile autenticarsi sul server. LA configurazione, il nome utente o la password potrebbero essere errati". Potete aiutarmi? Grazie!
creator: dino.meloni

title: Thunderbird 128.10.0esr (64-bit) linux print preview stuck in preparing preview
content:
Hello,

I'm currently facing the following issue using fedora 42 and Thunderbird 128.10.0esr, printing is not possible and the print preview is stuck with message Preparing preview.

1. Restarting Thunderbird with no extension dis not help. 2. In console (CTRL SHIF J) when print dialog box is displayed shows the following errors:

1746944381445 addons.xpi WARN Checking /app/lib64/thunderbird/distribution/extensions for addons 1746944382121 addons.xpi WARN Addon with ID thunderbird-compact-light@mozilla.org already installed, older version will be disabled 1746944382121 addons.xpi WARN Addon with ID thunderbird-compact-dark@mozilla.org already installed, older version will be disabled WebExtensions: Window manager refused to set window to state 2. ext-mail.js:1619 TypeError: browser is null PrintingParent.sys.mjs:11:7 TypeError: browser is null BrowserElementParent.sys.mjs:21:21 Missing resource in locale en-GB: devtools/client/toolbox.ftl Missing resource in locale en-CA: devtools/client/toolbox.ftl NotFoundError: No such JSProcessActor 'BrowserToolboxDevToolsProcess' TypeError: browser is null PrintingParent.sys.mjs:11:7 TypeError: browser is null BrowserElementParent.sys.mjs:21:21 Element.releaseCapture() is deprecated. Use Element.releasePointerCapture() instead. For more help https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/Element/releasePointerCapture menupopup.js:168:14 DOMException: Print preview failed 

   _printPreview chrome://global/content/printUtils.js:742    printPreview chrome://global/content/printUtils.js:685    _updatePrintPreview chrome://global/content/print.js:856    init chrome://global/content/print.js:343

DeferredTask.sys.mjs:343:15 Missing resource in locale en-GB: devtools/client/toolbox.ftl Missing resource in locale en-CA: devtools/client/toolbox.ftl NotFoundError: No such JSProcessActor 'BrowserToolboxDevToolsProcess' TypeError: browser is null PrintingParent.sys.mjs:11:7 TypeError: browser is null BrowserElementParent.sys.mjs:21:21 DOMException: Print preview failed 

   _printPreview chrome://global/content/printUtils.js:742    printPreview chrome://global/content/printUtils.js:685    _updatePrintPreview chrome://global/content/print.js:856    init chrome://global/content/print.js:343

print.js:862:15 DOMException: Print preview failed 

   _printPreview chrome://global/content/printUtils.js:742    printPreview chrome://global/content/printUtils.js:685    _updatePrintPreview chrome://global/content/print.js:856    init chrome://global/content/print.js:343

print.js:84:71 TypeError: browser is null PrintingParent.sys.mjs:11:7 TypeError: browser is null BrowserElementParent.sys.mjs:21:21 Missing resource in locale en-GB: devtools/client/toolbox.ftl Missing resource in locale en-CA: devtools/client/toolbox.ftl

Checked other reports on Thunderbird with broken print preview but did not found an answer. Suggestions are welcome, thanks for help
creator: fDe
